participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is friendly and nurturing, with a passion for guiding her students and sharing her love for nature.
participant_1.background: I am a woman. I have dogs. I attend church every week. I work as a school teacher. I enjoy gardening and walking outdoors.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Jessica is creative and down-to-earth, finding joy in simple activities like coloring and enjoying the outdoors.
participant_2.background: My husband is adopted. I've a German Shepherd dog. I live in a rural farming community. I like to watch NHL hockey. I enjoy coloring books.

content.text: Hey! Are you a woman? Because I am.
I am a teacher, what do you do?
I like to swim and do that
